channel.title: Content on About Maluki Muthusi
channel.description: Recent content in Content on About Maluki Muthusi

item.title: Books
item.description: One of my 2021’s goal is to read 30 books. These includes technical and non-technical books. I have a reading list at goodreads.com. You can follow me at maluki-muthusi. I would like to see what books you are reading, have read or you are planning to read. My book list is quite long, but I will highlight some of them here. Books Read The Linux Programming Interface: A Linux and Unix System Programming Handbook This is the best book to learn about the linux API’s.

item.title: About
item.description: About Me Hi, I am Maluki Muthusi. I am software engineer passionate about technology and its use cases in solving problems. Some of the programming languages I use are Go, Dart, Java, Kotlin and JavaScript. I do write cross platform applications using flutter toolkit. Reach Me You can reach me through social media LinkedIn, Twitter or Github. Or through my email malukimuthusi@gmail.com
